mapper.select: select id, code, name, specification, unit_price, cost_type, executive_department from non_medicine where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into non_medicine (code, name, specification, unit_price, cost_type, executive_department) values (#{code}, #{name}, #{specification}, #{unit_price}, #{cost_type}, #{executive_department})
mapper.update: update non_medicine set icd_code = #{icd_code}, code = #{code}, name = #{name}, type = #{type} where id = #{id}
